title: Соболев_тут
overview: An entertaining travel show in which comedian Ilya Sobolev travels around the cities of Russia and, together with local residents, explores unusual places. To release a wounded burial ground, to receive magical protection from a hermit monk, to catch a huge catfish on foam plastic - exciting adventures have been prepared for Sobolev in every city. At the end of each issue, Ilya will perform with a stand-up concert and improvisation with the audience.
